clientsManagement: 👥 Clients management in Retail, Financial, and Transportation sectors.
massiveDataAnalysis: 📊 Massive data analysis in ACL tool and visualization in Qlik Sense.
presentation1: Hello! I'm Michael Rodriguez, a data analyst with experience interpreting complex datasets. My focus is uncovering valuable insights to support informed decisions. I collaborate closely with teams to deliver insightful analyses that drive project success. If you're looking for someone committed and results-oriented in data analysis, I'd be delighted to be part of your next challenge!
presentation2: My approach is simple but powerful: propose solid solutions that really solve the organization's problems and, most importantly, involve people in the whole process.
proyDescription1: Comprehensive dashboard for American Bank, providing intuitive visualization of key financial data. Facilitates tracking transactions, balances, and trends.
proyDescription2: Innovative data management and analysis platform. Optimizes data collection and presentation, enhancing strategic decision-making.
proyDescription3: Global sales dashboard highlighting crucial data for business performance. Enables effective tracking of sales, customers, and worldwide market analysis.
proyDescription4: Project tracking dashboard streamlining the monitoring and management of multiple initiatives. Provides real-time visibility into milestones, resources, and progress.
title: Michael Rodriguez Portfolio
